issue.title: [Java] Set methods in DecimalVector are slow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5903](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5903). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The methods are doing a bound check on each byte in the input buffer and each byte on the output buffer. Avoiding this repetitive work improves perf by a factor of 2x to 3x.
